comments.raw_text:
This is a feature enhancement from end user. I file this bug on behalf of the user who request a feature from outlook. 

The user suggest to add "sent information" in inbox when we browsing the email in Thunderbird. 

Screen shot of Inbox from Thunderbird, see attachment 1. 
Screen shot of Inbox from outlook, see attachment 2
comments.creator: yang.chen@oracle.com
